articles.title: Sarah Beeny reveals she has breast cancer: ‘I knew I was going to hear it one day’ - The Independent
articles.description: The 50-year-old presenter was diagnosed with cancer three weeks ago
articles.content:
Sarah Beeny has revealed that she has been diagnosed with breast cancer.
